description: A type confusion issue in Windows Pragmatic General Multicast (PGM) allowing remote code execution via crafted traffic, affecting versions 10.0.19045.4046, 10.0.10240.20469, 10.0.22631.3155, 10.0.22621.3155, 10.0.22000.2777, and 10.0.19044.4046. The flaw allows exploitation via specially crafted multicast traffic sent to a vulnerable server, reliant on network conditions and with potential loss of confidentiality, integrity, and availability.
